topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Creating a Volume Snapshot

body.p: A snapshot is a new volume based on a running instance. That snapshot can be used as the base for new instances.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Volumes tab.
Under the Actions column, click Create Snapshot, next to the volume you want to snapshot.
In the Create Volume Snapshot dialog box, enter the name and description.

Click Create Volume Snapshot to confirm.
A snapshot image is created on the Volume Snapshot table.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Volumes tab.
Select the volume snapshot or snapshots that you want to delete.
In the Confirm Delete Volume Snapshot dialog box, click Delete Volume Types.
